pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Wednesday, July 1, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

10:15 a.m. The Prime Minister and his family will visit the Ottawa Food Bank farm, where they will harvest vegetables.

Ottawa Food Bank farm
Mansfield Road

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister and Mrs. Grégoire Trudeau will deliver remarks to celebrate Canada Day.

Ottawa Food Bank farm
Mansfield Road

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage

Media Appearances

11:20 a.m. A brief interview with the Prime Minister will be broadcast live on Radio-Canada.

11:25 a.m. A brief interview with the Prime Minister will be broadcast live on CBC.
